MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 postcode area of Congleton affecting properties in Watery Lane, Newcastle Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:55am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by broken equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:19am on 2nd February 2021.
